GCD.Name: Fast Blade
GCD.Description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 220.

GCD.Name: Riot Blade
GCD.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 140.
Combo Action: Fast Blade
Combo Potency: 300
Combo Bonus: Restores MP

GCD.Name: Royal Authority
GCD.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 140.
Combo Action: Riot Blade
Combo Potency: 400
Combo Bonus: Grants 3 stacks of Sword Oath
Duration: 30s
Combo Bonus: Grants Divine Might
Divine Might Effect: Allows next Holy Spirit or Holy Circle to be cast immediately with increased potency
Duration: 30s

GCD.Name: Total Eclipse
GCD.Description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 100 to all nearby enemies.

GCD.Name: Shield Bash
GCD.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 100.
Additional Effect: Stun
Duration: 6s

GCD.Name: Shield Lob
GCD.Description:
Delivers a ranged attack with a potency of 100.
Additional Effect: Increased enmity

GCD.Name: Rage of Halone
GCD.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 100.
Combo Action: Riot Blade
Combo Potency: 330

GCD.Name: Prominence
GCD.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 100 to all nearby enemies.
Combo Action: Total Eclipse
Combo Potency: 170
Combo Bonus: Restores MP
Combo Bonus: Grants Divine Might
Divine Might Effect: Allows next Holy Spirit or Holy Circle to be cast immediately with increased potency
Duration: 30s

GCD.Name: Goring Blade
GCD.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 700.
Can only be executed while under the effect of Goring Blade Ready.

GCD.Name: Clemency
GCD.Description:
Restores target's HP.
Cure Potency: 1,000
Additional Effect: Restores to self 50% of HP restored to target if target is a party member

GCD.Name: Holy Spirit
GCD.Description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 370.
Divine Might Potency: 470
Requiescat Potency: 670
The effect of Divine Might will be prioritized over Requiescat when under the effect of both.
Additional Effect: Restores own HP
Cure Potency: 400

GCD.Name: Holy Circle
GCD.Description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 100 to all nearby enemies.
Divine Might Potency: 200
Requiescat Potency: 300
The effect of Divine Might will be prioritized over Requiescat when under the effect of both.
Additional Effect: Restores own HP
Cure Potency: 400

GCD.Name: Atonement
GCD.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 440.
Additional Effect: Restores MP
Additional Effect: Grants Supplication Ready
Duration: 30s
Can only be executed while under the effect of Atonement Ready.

GCD.Name: Supplication
GCD.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 460.
Additional Effect: Restores MP
Additional Effect: Grants Sepulchre Ready
Duration: 30s
Can only be executed while under the effect of Supplication Ready.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
※Atonement changes to Supplication when requirements for execution are met.

GCD.Name: Sepulchre
GCD.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 480.
Additional Effect: Restores MP
Can only be executed while under the effect of Sepulchre Ready.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
※Supplication changes to Sepulchre when requirements for execution are met.

GCD.Name: Confiteor
GCD.Description:
Deals unaspected damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 440 for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.
Requiescat Potency: 940
Additional Effect: Restores own HP
Cure Potency: 400
Can only be executed while under the effect of Confiteor Ready. Effect fades upon execution.

GCD.Name: Blade of Faith
GCD.Description:
Deals unaspected damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 240 for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.
Requiescat Potency: 740
Combo Action: Confiteor
Additional Effect: Restores own HP
Cure Potency: 400

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
※Confiteor changes to Blade of Faith when requirements for execution are met.

GCD.Name: Blade of Truth
GCD.Description:
Deals unaspected damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 340 for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.
Requiescat Potency: 840
Combo Action: Blade of Faith
Additional Effect: Restores own HP
Cure Potency: 400

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
※Blade of Faith changes to Blade of Truth when requirements for execution are met.

GCD.Name: Blade of Valor
GCD.Description:
Deals unaspected damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 440 for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.
Requiescat Potency: 940
Combo Action: Blade of Truth
Additional Effect: Restores own HP
Cure Potency: 400
Additional Effect: Grants Blade of Honor Ready
Duration: 30s

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
※Blade of Truth changes to Blade of Valor when requirements for execution are met.

OGCD.Name: Fight or Flight
OGCD.Description:
Increases damage dealt by 25%.
Duration: 20s

OGCD.Name: Iron Will
OGCD.Description: Significantly increases enmity generation.</br>Effect ends upon reuse.

OGCD.Name: Release Iron Will
OGCD.Description: Cancels the effect of Iron Will.

OGCD.Name: Spirits Within
OGCD.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 270.
Additional Effect: Restores MP

OGCD.Name: Sheltron
OGCD.Description:
Reduces damage taken by 15%.
Duration: 6s
Oath Gauge Cost: 50

OGCD.Name: Sentinel
OGCD.Description:
Reduces damage taken by 30%.
Duration: 15s

OGCD.Name: Cover
OGCD.Description:
Take all damage intended for another party member as long as said member remains within 10 yalms.
Does not activate with certain attacks.
Duration: 12s
Oath Gauge Cost: 50

OGCD.Name: Circle of Scorn
OGCD.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 140 to all nearby enemies.
Additional Effect: Damage over time
Potency: 30
Duration: 15s

OGCD.Name: Hallowed Ground
OGCD.Description:
Renders you impervious to most attacks.
Duration: 10s

OGCD.Name: Bulwark
OGCD.Description:
Block incoming attacks.
Duration: 10s

OGCD.Name: Divine Veil
OGCD.Description:
Creates a barrier around self and all party members near you that absorbs damage equivalent to 10% of your maximum HP.
Duration: 30s
Additional Effect: Restores target's HP
Cure Potency: 400

OGCD.Name: Intervention
OGCD.Description:
Reduces target party member's damage taken by 10%.
Duration: 8s
Additional Effect: Increases damage reduction by an additional 10% if Rampart or Guardian are active
Additional Effect: Grants Knight's Resolve to target
Knight's Resolve Effect: Reduces damage taken by 10%
Duration: 4s
Additional Effect: Grants Knight's Benediction to target
Knight's Benediction Effect: Gradually restores HP
Cure Potency: 250
Duration: 12s
Oath Gauge Cost: 50

OGCD.Name: Requiescat
OGCD.Description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 320.
Additional Effect: Grants 4 stacks of Requiescat
Requiescat Effect: Increases the potency of Holy Spirit, Holy Circle, and all Confiteor combo actions and spells will require no cast time
Additional Effect: Grants Confiteor Ready
Duration: 30s

OGCD.Name: Passage of Arms
OGCD.Description:
Increases block rate to 100% and creates a designated area in a cone behind you in which party members will only suffer 85% of all damage inflicted.
Duration: 18s
Effect ends upon using another action or moving (including facing a different direction).
Cancels auto-attack upon execution.

OGCD.Name: Intervene
OGCD.Description:
Rushes target and delivers an attack with a potency of 150.
Maximum Charges: 2
Cannot be executed while bound.

OGCD.Name: Holy Sheltron
OGCD.Description:
Reduces damage taken by 15%.
Duration: 8s
Additional Effect: Grants Knight's Resolve
Knight's Resolve Effect: Reduces damage taken by 15%
Duration: 4s
Additional Effect: Grants Knight's Benediction
Knight's Benediction Effect: Gradually restores HP
Cure Potency: 250
Duration: 12s
Oath Gauge Cost: 50

OGCD.Name: Expiacion
OGCD.Description:
Delivers an attack to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 450 for the first enemy, and 60% less for all remaining enemies.
Additional Effect: Restores MP

OGCD.Name: Guardian
OGCD.Description:
Reduces damage taken by 40%.
Duration: 15s
Additional Effect: Erects a magicked barrier which nullifies damage equivalent to a heal of 1,000 potency
Duration: 15s

OGCD.Name: Imperator
OGCD.Description:
Deals unaspected damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 580 for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.
Additional Effect: Grants 4 stacks of Requiescat
Duration: 30s
Requiescat Effect: Increases the potency of Holy Spirit, Holy Circle, and all Confiteor combo actions, and spells will require no cast time
Additional Effect: Grants Confiteor Ready
Duration: 30s

OGCD.Name: Blade of Honor
OGCD.Description:
Deals unaspected damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 1,000 for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.
Can only be executed while under the effect of Blade of Honor Ready.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
※Imperator changes to Blade of Honor when requirements for execution are met.
